msg: Try to work with files that don't have a master SlideListWithText, but go straight into a Slides one. Throw a better exception on slides with a mixed first SlideListWithText (see bug 41176 for more details)

msg: If we have a picture of type 0, don't even bother trying to create a PictureData object for it
